  The f5distributedcloud_user resource manages Users in F5 Distributed Cloud.
  Users represent individuals who can access the F5 Distributed Cloud console and API.
  Example Usage
  
  resource "f5distributedcloud_user" "example" {
    name       = "john-doe"
    namespace  = "system"
    email      = "john.doe@example.com"
    first_name = "John"
    last_name  = "Doe"

      name      = "admin-role"

# f5distributedcloud_user (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_user` resource manages Users in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Users represent individuals who can access the F5 Distributed Cloud console and API.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_user" "example" {
  name       = "john-doe"
  namespace  = "system"
  email      = "john.doe@example.com"
  first_name = "John"
  last_name  = "Doe"
  type       = "USER"

  roles {
    name      = "admin-role"
    namespace = "system"
  }
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `email` (String) Email address of the user.
- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `first_name` (String) First name of the user.
- `last_name` (String) Last name of the user.
- `roles` (Block List) List of roles assigned to the user. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--roles))
- `type` (String) Type of user (USER, SERVICE_CREDENTIAL).

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--roles"></a>
### Nested Schema for `roles`

Required:

- `name` (String) Name of the role.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace of the role.
